Title: S6 Ep. 236 Gonzalo Tudela - Future of Educational Testing
Description:
I met Gonzalo Tundela when we both were accepted to the Transcend Network Fellowship program.  He is extremely well-versed in financial literacy and a wisdom vault with how to set up and navigate investor processes and relationships.  Why should you listen to his interview? Because he is a #futurist, has expertise in #finance, #leadership, and #strategy. His TEDx talk was about wearable tech.  So many reasons, this episode will not disappoint.  

The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #DEI #Skills-based #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike. Sign up to be an #Employer4Change that invests in #intern #talent and your #employees.

Want a break? Play Intern Pursuit Game on Steam.  Thank you to our sponsor Cat 5 Studios.
